definition.jsonSchema: {"$schema":"http://json-schema.org/schema#","documents":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"subtype__v":{"description":"Subtype","type":"string"},"name__v":{"description":"Name - Displayed throughout application for the document, including in Library, Reporting, Notifications and Workflows.","type":"string","maxLength":100},"version_id":{"type":"string","maxLength":20},"minor_version_number__v":{"description":"Minor Version Number","type":"number"},"file":{"type":"string"},"lifecycle__v":{"description":"Lifecycle - A configurable series of states (Draft, Under Review, Approved) through which a document progresses during its life.","type":"string"},"require_certified_copy__c":{"description":"Require Certified Copy? - Required if this Vault document will replace a paper, sponsor-owned clinical trial record. Not required for copies of paper records from an investigator site.","type":"boolean"},"study__v":{"description":"Study","type":"string"},"notes__v":{"description":"Notes","type":"string","maxLength":255},"type__v":{"description":"Type","type":"string"},"id":{"type":"string","maxLength":20},"classification__v":{"description":"Classification","type":"string"},"major_version_number__v":{"description":"Major Version Number","type":"number"}}}}}
